name: Ørsted A/S
membership: In Brussels Ørsted is a member of EFET, Wind Europe, Biobased Industries Public Private Partnership and European biogas association. Ørsted is involved in several informal networks within the field of climate and energy policy
goal: The objectives of the Company are to carry on business in the energy sector and activities related thereto. The vision of the company is a world that runs on green energy
interests: Climate Action, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All issues related to the regulation of the energy sector, including for instance the reform of the EU ETS and the implementation of the European green deal
